Scene8SpeakerFune: ^Funé: Hiiiiii-yaaahhh! You young one, you come to challenge master Funé?
^Choose to back down from his challenge

c-0: ^Darwin: I’ve got a sword and I’m prepared to use it! En garde!
^Funé: Haha, we have a feisty one here!
c-1: ^Funé: Oh, apologies, I get carried away sometimes, especially when I’m in the midst of practicing my katas.
c-2: ^Darwin: Why would I want to? With a scar like that, seems like someone else has already challenged you enough.
^Funé: Seems like ol’ Funé should teach you some manners.

Dovetail: ^Funé: Alright, well we’ll hold off on our challenge for now. You aren’t ready to face the mighty Funé of Death Gorge anyhow. But if not to challenge me, what does bring you here little mouseling?
^Darwin: Well honestly, I’m not really sure why I’m here. Nezumi sent me.
^Funé: Nezumi, huh? And why would Nezumi be sending a wee little mouse to see an accomplished Sensei like myself?
^Darwin: He said he knew my grandpa. He seems to think that I could help with something.
^Funé: Hmmm…I see. Your name wouldn’t be Darwin would it?
^Funé: Mmmm..well then I guess that ol’ geezer hasn’t lost his crackers yet.

^Funé: Call me Sensei. And as your sensei, I think there is something you can help me with. You see, these pesky possums have been terrorizing Totten Town as of late. And we are in need of some fresh young blood to help nip this issue in the bud. I think it’s time you put that sword of yours to good use, what do you say?
^Choose to try and get out of fighting any possums
^Choose to make fun of Funé’s inability to take care of himself

c-0: ^Darwin: Finally! I thought you’d never ask!
c-1: ^Darwin: Yyy…you www…want mmmm…me to ffff..fight possums? IIII..dunno…
^Funé: Nonsense, every young grasshopper has got to start somewhere.
c-2: ^Darwin: If you’re such a good fighter, then why don’t you take care of them yourself?
^Funé: Ahh, young grasshopper, still much to learn in the art of respecting your Sensei I see.

Dovetail2: ^Funé: Let’s get your training started then shall we. Head into the Unbridled Wood and slay ten possum minions. Once you have, return to me.
